backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining AC submission system with types (Condition, Submission), storage in a Map, submitAC function with validation and duplicate checking, and authenticated query functions (getSubmission, getAllSubmissions, getAllCustomerContacts) protected by assertIsAuthenticated.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three authentication-related features in Layout.tsx: checking if user is authenticated before calling login(), adding conditional navigation logic, and implementing error handling for already-authenticated scenarios.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing detailed summaries of all frontend source files including components, pages, hooks, and configuration files with focus on authentication flow, form handling, and UI structure.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining OKLCH color system for light and dark modes, including neutral grayscale palette and theme tokens for UI components.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script tag loading main.tsx, titled 'AC Buy'.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component setting up TanStack Router with routes (home, submit, success, pricing, contact, admin), QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, Toaster, and HistoryState interface for passing customer contact data.
frontend/src/components/ACSubmissionForm: Form component for AC submission with validation, state management, error handling, and navigation to success page with customer contact details passed via history state after successful backend submission.
frontend/src/components/ContactInfo.tsx: Reusable card component displaying contact information (phone, email, address, business hours) with icons in a responsive grid layout.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Layout wrapper with header navigation, mobile menu, admin dashboard button with authentication checking using identity.getPrincipal().isAnonymous(), comprehensive error handling for already-authenticated scenarios, logout functionality, and detailed console logging throughout authentication flow.
frontend/src/components/PricingCalculato: Interactive pricing calculator component that displays estimated AC buyback prices based on age/condition selection (2-3 years: ₹3000-4000, 3-5 years: ₹2500, dead: ₹2000).
frontend/src/components/PricingFactorCar: Reusable card component that displays a pricing factor with an icon, title, and description, supporting both Lucide icons and custom image sources.
frontend/src/hooks/useACSubmission.ts: Custom hook that handles AC submission form data to the backend canister, managing submission state, error handling, and detailed logging throughout the process.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state, automatically invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout flow, identity persistence, and authentication state with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Custom React Query hooks for fetching AC submissions from the backend, including getAllSubmissions and getSubmission by ID with error handling and authentication checks.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom warm earth-toned color palette defined using CSS variables for both light and dark modes, including primary terracotta/rust colors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication context.
frontend/src/pages/Admin.tsx: Admin dashboard page that requires Internet Identity authentication to view all customer AC submissions in a sortable table with filtering, refresh capability, and displays submission details including condition badges and timestamps.
frontend/src/pages/Contact.tsx: Contact page displaying multiple contact channels, quick response information, and an FAQ section covering quote process, pickup services, accepted brands, and non-working units.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Landing page with hero section featuring call-to-action buttons, four feature cards highlighting competitive prices/speed/trust/eco-friendliness, and a 'How It Works' section explaining the AC selling process.
frontend/src/pages/PricingInfo.tsx: Pricing information page with an interactive calculator, six pricing factor cards (age, condition, brand, efficiency, demand, value), example pricing tiers, and a CTA to submit AC details for a personalized quote.
frontend/src/pages/SubmissionSuccess.tsx: Success confirmation page displayed after AC submission, showing customer contact details, next steps timeline, owner phone numbers for direct contact, and navigation buttons to home or submit another AC.
frontend/src/pages/SubmitAC.tsx: AC submission form page with three benefit cards (quick response, no obligation, secure process) and the main ACSubmissionForm component for users to enter their air conditioner details.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration file that defines custom theme extensions including color schemes using OKLCH color space, typography settings with Inter font, container queries, animations, and various UI component styles for a design system.
project_state.json: Project state tracking file for a used air conditioner purchase website, documenting 33 versions of features including homepage, quote submission form, admin dashboard, and known issues with authentication and contact details display.
